error.message:
Error activating IBulgarianLatinConvertService No matching bindings are available, and the type is not self-bindable. Activation path: 2) Injection of dependency IBulgarianLatinConvertService into parameter bulgarianLatinConvertService of constructor of type ArticlesController 1) Request for ArticlesController
Suggestions: 1) Ensure that you have defined a binding for IBulgarianLatinConvertService. 2) If the binding was defined in a module, ensure that the module has been loaded into the kernel. 3) Ensure you have not accidentally created more than one kernel. 4) If you are using constructor arguments, ensure that the parameter name matches the constructors parameter name. 5) If you are using automatic module loading, ensure the search path and filters are correct.
error.detail:
System.InvalidOperationException: An error occurred when trying to create a controller of type 'Uspelite.Web.Controllers.ArticlesController'. Make sure that the controller has a parameterless public constructor. ---> Ninject.ActivationException: Error activating IBulgarianLatinConvertService No matching bindings are available, and the type is not self-bindable. Activation path: 2) Injection of dependency IBulgarianLatinConvertService into parameter bulgarianLatinConvertService of constructor of type ArticlesController 1) Request for ArticlesController
Suggestions: 1) Ensure that you have defined a binding for IBulgarianLatinConvertService. 2) If the binding was defined in a module, ensure that the module has been loaded into the kernel. 3) Ensure you have not accidentally created more than one kernel. 4) If you are using constructor arguments, ensure that the parameter name matches the constructors parameter name. 5) If you are using automatic module loading, ensure the search path and filters are correct.
